creator: apache@3six9.com
text:
batik is installed to c:\FOP\batik-1.1.1 and when I run the following:

c:\FOP\batik-1.1.1>java -jar batik-rasterizer.jar -m application/pdf 
samples/batikFX.svg

the error below is thrown:

Error while converting files:
 Error: cannot access transcoder for image of type application/pdf

I have read the FAQs, and all documentation but cannot get through this.

Do I need pdf.transcoder.jar to be present?
I am refering here to the diagram on http://xml.apache.org/batik/install.html
under Jar File Dependency Graph.

I apologise if this is just a config issue.
Many thanks
Use batik-1.5 beta5, has PDF transcoder included.
creator: apache@3six9.com
